title: Summoner Name Change
body:
I want to change my summoner name but in my client i am missing the Account Profile button which when clicked shows the account and the icon to change the summoners name, how can i get this to show up so i can make a name change?

Thanks
Mike

replies.body:
Name changes may not be fully operational just yet on the updated client.  Try this out on the legacy client to perform your name change:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
